h2. Support
{{div3: class=support | ng-app=myApp | ng-controller=SupportController}}
{{ contact_form: receiver_email:tayseerm@incubaid.com | custom | subject: CloudScalers.com support}}
    {{html: <!-- Angular doesn't bind hidden input. This is a workaround to make it work -->}}
    {{html: <input type="text" style="display: none" name="sender_name" ng-model="settings.name">}}
    {{html: <input type="text" style="display: none" name="sender_email" ng-model="settings.email">}}

    {{div: class=control-group}}
        {{html: <label class="control-label" for="topic">Topic</label>}}
        {{div2: class=controls}}
            {{ text: name=topic | required=true | class=input-large}}
        {{div2}}
    {{div}}

    {{div: class=control-group}}
        {{html: <label class="control-label" for="body">Description</label>}}
        {{div2: class=controls}}
            {{ textarea: name=body | required=true }}
        {{div2}}
    {{div}}

    {{div: class=form-actions}}
        {{ submit: class=btn btn-info btn-large | data-loading-text=Sending... }}
            {{html: Send to Support}}
        {{submit}}
    {{div}}

{{ contact_form }}
{{div3}}


{{html:
<hr>
<form class="form-horizontal support">
<fieldset>

<!-- Text input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="textinput">Topic</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="text" placeholder="" class="input-large">
    
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Textarea -->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="textarea">Description</label>
  <div class="controls">                     
    <textarea id="textarea" name="textarea"></textarea>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Button -->
<div class="form-actions">

    <button id="singlebutton" name="singlebutton" class="btn btn-info btn-large ">Send to Support</button>
 
</div>

</fieldset>
</form>

}}
